m_szDocSumamry: Energy industry news, analysis, and commentary Opinion: Low Oil Prices Need not Slow Electric Cars By Peter Lehner and Yossie Hollander on March 04, 2015 at 10:00 AM The sudden decline in oil price has prompted some analysts to predict bad days ahead for electric and other fuel-efficient cars. While the price of oil may be low today, history teaches us that it will rise again. The true cost of our oil dependence remains high.
